programs.title: Two Focused Paths for Grade 9 and Grade 12

grade9.title: Grade 9 - Foundations and Confidence
grade9.forWho: Students transitioning into high school who need stable fundamentals.

grade9.outcome: Clear understanding, better class participation, and stronger grades through weekly structure.

grade12.title: Grade 12 - Exam and BAC Preparation
grade12.forWho: Final-year students preparing for BAC and high-stakes exams.

grade12.outcome: Faster, more accurate solving with targeted exam practice and confidence under pressure.

about.title: A Calm Mentor for Serious Academic Progress
about.paragraph1: {{mentorName}} is a mathematics mentor focused on helping Grade 9 and Grade 12 students build real understanding, not just memorize formulas. Lessons are clear, step-by-step, and adapted to each student's pace.
about.paragraph2: Parents choose this mentoring approach for structure, consistency, and transparency. Every week includes focused objectives, practical feedback, and a clear path toward exam confidence.

principles.item1: Clarity first: each concept explained in simple, logical steps.
principles.item2: Structured practice: weekly plan with increasing difficulty.
principles.item3: Results focus: exam strategy, error analysis, and measurable progress.

structuredPlan.title: Structured Learning Plan
structuredPlan.text: Each student follows a tailored plan aligned with current level and academic goals.

weeklyFeedback.title: Weekly Feedback
weeklyFeedback.text: You receive concise updates on lesson focus, homework quality, and next priorities.

measurableProgress.title: Measurable Progress
measurableProgress.text: Progress is tracked through checkpoints, mock tests, and problem-solving consistency.

calmStyle.title: Calm Mentoring Style
calmStyle.text: Students learn in a focused, respectful environment that builds confidence steadily.

method.title: A Simple 3-Step Process for Reliable Results

step1.title: Assessment and Level Check
step1.text: We identify current strengths, gaps, and exam priorities for a realistic starting plan.

step2.title: Weekly Structured Lessons
step2.text: Each week combines concept clarity, guided exercises, and targeted homework review.

step3.title: Exam Practice and Feedback
step3.text: Students train with exam-style tasks, timing strategy, and focused correction loops.
